title.narrative: USAID redacted this field in accordance with the exceptions outlined in the Foreign Aid Transparency and Accountability Act of 2016.
USAID redactó este campo de acuerdo con las excepciones resumidas en la transparencia de la ayuda exterior y el acto de la responsabilidad de 2016.

description.narrative: Objectives for Colombia: Program Objectives: Strengthen victims’ organizations’ technical, organizational, administrative and financial capacities, increasing their ability to represent victim’s interests before the state. Support local initiatives that defend, protect and promote individual and/or collective victim´s rights to justice, truth and integral reparation.
USAID redacted this field in accordance with the exceptions outlined in the Foreign Aid Transparency and Accountability Act of 2016.
USAID redactó este campo de acuerdo con las excepciones resumidas en la transparencia de la ayuda exterior y el acto de la responsabilidad de 2016.
